text: Could you share the request body that you are sending to HubSpot?  That would help track down what is going on

I have 65 contacts and I want to use a API that will be updated the all contacts.

            e,g city = "Cambridge" how I can do it ?

            Thanks in advance

Can you share that request body (the on where you add more) and the error you get in response?
Also, can you please stop posting the same question in every channel?

Hello, I have a question.
Is there any way possible, to implement from my main website’s Header/Footer in
HubSpot Blog Template?  To save a lot of time building a new Header/Footer in blog section

I would like to roughly speaking Copy my sites Header and Paste in to the HubSpot Blog Template

The reason why we need this is because, HubSpot MainMenu is module and can’t access some of exact elements. Menu dropdowns by default on hover, even there are no :hover pseudo classes in CSS file nor JS script. Major issue is with font and font-family even  writing exactly same CSS style as there is in main site, still don’t works, some font texts are either  bolder or thicker. In other words for some unknown reasons main sites exact styles and scripts  don't work  in HubSpot Header Blog module.

If there are any  ways via API ro any kind, and if there is how could it be done?

Hey <@UGJ3XBBGF> that sounds like you could use an ajax request from your site and pull your header and footer from there. We also used to have a project that uses the header and footer from the main website (which was built on WordPress) to the blog (built on HubSpot)
I did try this but this API execute Successfully and update only two records that I provided it by Vid and emailID. My question I want to update all the contacts
